headline: Well-Known Investor Bought Palantir Technologies Inc. (PLTR) Stock

(PLTR) had delivered “fantastic” first-quarter results earlier this month, veteran investor Kevin Simpson noted on Friday that he had acquired shares of the very expensive tech name.
